bridle.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a set of leather bands put around a horse’s head and used to control its movements
bridle.translation[1].definitions[0].def: to become angry and offended about something
bridle.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: The senator bridled at the reporter’s question.
bridle.translation[1].definitions[1].def: to put a bridle on a horse
